#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int main()
{
	int n, test, i, sum, s, a[100], j=1;
	
	while(2)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n!=0)
		{
			sum=0;
			s=0;
			for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
			{
				scanf("%d",&a[i]);
				sum = sum + a[i];
			}

			for(i=0; i<n; i++)
			{
				if(a[i]>=(sum/n))
				{
					s = s + (a[i] - sum/n);
				}
			}
			printf("Set #%d\n",j);
			printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",s);
			printf("\n");
			j=j+1;
		}
		else
		{
			exit(0);
		}
	}
		
	return 0;	
}
